fixes.name: WACS T (bps)
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR paramUseCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR paramEndDate = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
VAR Numerator = SUMX(
    'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)',
    IF(
        paramUseCustom,
        IF(
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Max Date] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM] * 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Coll Spread],
            0
        ),
        IF(
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate] = paramEndDate,
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM] * 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Coll Spread],
            0
        )
    )
)
VAR Denominator = SUMX(
    'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)',
    IF(
        paramUseCustom,
        IF(
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Max Date] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM],
            0
        ),
        IF(
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate] = paramEndDate,
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM],
            0
        )
    )
)
RETURN DIVIDE(Numerator, Denominator) * 100
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced Tableau parameter references with SELECTEDVALUE(...) per rules; converted row-level conditional logic inside SUM() to SUMX(table, ...) for DAX; transformed all column references to 'Table'[Column] format; used DIVIDE for safe division and multiplied result by 100.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references parameters and uses aggregations (SUM), so it must be implemented as a measure.
